    A Leaf which renders a BufferedImage to the screen

    Leaf
    A leaf is a Widget which has no children
    MultiChildParent
    A parent which contains multiple child Widgets

    A SingleChildParent which renders its child with transparency

    A SingleChildParent which adds padding around its single child
    Padding.PaddingOptions
     
    Panel
    A SingleChildParent which uses the 9-patch algorithm to render a BufferedImage as a background to its descendants
    Panel.PanelOptions
     
    Parent
    A parent is a Widget which can contain one or more children.
    Row
    A Flex which arranges its children horizontally
    Row.RowOptions

    A SingleChildParent which scales the computed size of its child
    Scaled.ScaledOptions

    A parent which contains only one child Widget
